conbody.p: (a) Upon receiving adequate written justification from the requesting program office or activity, the contracting officer reviews, validates, and processes the NID and associated written approvals, in accordance with AFH 16-1406 , National Interest Determination Handbook.
(b) The contracting officer shall maintain a copy of the approved program, project, or contract specific NID package in the contract file.
